title: ரயில் கட்டணம் ரூ.4 உயர்வா? - ஃபேஸ்புக் வதந்தி
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: In order to expand passenger amenities and facilities at Railway stations and in trains, it has become imperative to increase the train fare marginally without over burdening any class of passengers. Fast modernization of Indian Railway will be achieved through this fare revision pic.twitter.com/OXBEq0PSdl
